# objCType

**Instance Property**

A C string containing the Objective-C type of the data contained in the value object.

## Declaration

```swift
var objCType: UnsafePointer<CChar> { get }
```

## Discussion

This property provides the same string produced by the `@encode()` compiler directive.

## Working with Raw Values

- **init(bytes:objCType:)**: Initializes a value object to contain the specified value, interpreted with the specified Objective-C type.
- **init(_:withObjCType:)**: Creates a value object containing the specified value, interpreted with the specified Objective-C type.
- **getValue(_:)**: Copies the value into the specified buffer.
